channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Guardium
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Guardium

item.title: CVE-2021-20426|2024-09-16T16:58:49.386Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.2 contains hard-coded credentials, such as a password or cryptographic key, which it uses for its own inbound authentication, outbound communication to external components, or encryption of internal data. IBM X-Force ID: 196313.

item.title: CVE-2017-1598|2024-09-16T16:33:12.166Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10.0 Database Activity Monitor uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 132611.

item.title: CVE-2017-1600|2024-09-16T16:49:10.142Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10.0 Database Activity Monitor is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 132613.

item.title: CVE-2017-1597|2024-09-16T16:34:00.796Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10.0, 10.0.1, 10.1, 10.1.2, 10.1.3, 10.1.4, and 10.5 Database Activity Monitor does not require that users should have strong passwords by default, which makes it easier for attackers to compromise user accounts. IBM X-Force ID: 132610.

item.title: CVE-2020-4180|2024-09-16T16:33:37.117Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.1 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 174735.

item.title: CVE-2020-4307|2024-09-16T16:24:19.325Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.1 could allow an attacker on the same network to gain access to the Solr dashboard and cause a denial of service attack. IBM X-Force ID: 176997.

item.title: CVE-2020-4680|2024-09-16T16:23:05.394Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 186426.

item.title: CVE-2017-1268|2024-09-16T16:58:16.273Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10 and 10.5 uses a one-way cryptographic hash against an input that should not be reversible, such as a password, but the software does not also use a salt as part of the input. IBM X-Force ID: 124743.

item.title: CVE-2021-20385|2024-09-16T16:32:51.559Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.2 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 195766.

item.title: CVE-2021-39078|2024-09-16T16:33:32.644Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10.5 stores user credentials in plain clear text which can be read by a local privileged user. IBM X-Force ID: 215589.

item.title: CVE-2023-47712|2024-08-02T21:16:43.649Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 could allow a local user to gain elevated privileges on the system due to improper permissions control. IBM X-Force ID: 271527.

item.title: CVE-2023-47710|2024-08-02T21:16:43.555Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 271525.

item.title: CVE-2023-47717|2024-08-02T21:16:43.549Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 12.0 could allow a privileged user to perform unauthorized actions that could lead to a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 271690.

item.title: CVE-2023-47709|2024-08-02T21:16:43.642Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system by sending a specially crafted request. IBM X-Force ID: 271524.

item.title: CVE-2023-47711|2024-08-02T21:16:43.656Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 could allow an authenticated user to upload files that would cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 271526.

item.title: CVE-2023-47711|2024-07-23T21:00:38.139Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 could allow an authenticated user to upload files that would cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 271526.

item.title: CVE-2023-47709|2024-06-04T17:26:43.588Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system by sending a specially crafted request. IBM X-Force ID: 271524.

item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 could allow a local user to gain elevated privileges on the system due to improper permissions control. IBM X-Force ID: 271527.

item.title: CVE-2023-47711|2024-05-11T13:18:21.646Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 could allow an authenticated user to upload files that would cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 271526.

item.title: CVE-2023-47710|2024-06-04T17:26:36.057Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 271525.

item.title: CVE-2023-47717|2024-06-04T17:26:34.287Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 12.0 could allow a privileged user to perform unauthorized actions that could lead to a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 271690.
